name: Nintendo DS Sound Sequence File
summary: Learn about .SSEQ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SSEQ files can be found within .SDAT Nintendo DS sound data files, which are stored within .NDS ROM files. SSEQ files can be converted to the .MID format using sseq2mid. The midi2sseq program can convert MID files to the SSEQ format.

description: An SSEQ file is an audio file saved in the Nintendo DS Sound Sequence (SSEQ) format. It is used by various games for the Nintendo DS, a portable game system that includes a touch screen. SSEQ files contain sounds and music for the game that are referenced for playback during gameplay.
